name: UX Playbook (Notion)
description: This manual contains vetted product strategy and user experience frameworks used by leading Silicon Valley companies and product leaders at Netflix, Meta, Amazon, Stripe, Apple, Google, and Y Combinator.Whether you're stuck in your career or project, this manual can dramatically change your trajectory and help you achieve tangible results. The material has been rigorously tested on real six-figure projects throughout 15 years of work with leading Silicon Valley startups, Fortune 500 companies an
features: Growth Design: Netflix onboarding (FigJam source file); My Personal Gamification Framework; 15 Behavioral Design Principles; 57 Articles; Gamification Strategy Template; Messaging & Copy Teardown Template; Heuristic Evaluation for Websites Template; CRO Website Presentation Template; Accessibility
